Package de.mrapp.apriori

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    Defines the interface, an item, which is part of a transaction, must implement.
    Metric
    Defines the interface, a class, which allows to measure the "interestingly" of association rules according to a certain metric, must implement.
    Operator
    Defines the interface, a class, which allows to calculate heuristic values of association rules, must implement.
    Transaction<ItemType extends Item>
    Defines the interface, a transaction, which consists of multiple items, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Apriori<ItemType extends Item>
    An implementation of the Apriori algorithm for mining frequent item sets and (optionally) generating association rules.
    Apriori.Builder<ItemType extends Item>
    A builder, which allows to configure and create instances of the class Apriori.
    Apriori.Configuration
    An configuration of the Apriori algorithm.
    Apriori.RuleGeneratorBuilder<ItemType extends Item>
    A builder, which allows to configure and create instances of the class Apriori, which are configured to generate association rules.
    AssociationRule<ItemType extends Item>
    An association rule of the form X -> Y, which consists of a body X and a head Y.
    Filter<T>
    A filter, which can be applied to item sets or association rules.
    Filter.AssociationRuleFilter
    A filter, which applies to association rules.
    Filter.ItemSetFilter
    A filter, which applies to item sets.
    FrequentItemSets<ItemType extends Item>
    A sorted set, which contains frequent item sets.
    ItemSet<ItemType>
    An item set, which may contain several items.
    Output<ItemType extends Item>
    An output of the Apriori algorithm.
    RuleSet<ItemType extends Item>
    A rule set, which contains multiple association rules.
    Sorting<T>
    A sorting, which specifies how item sets or association rules should be sorted.
    Sorting.AssociationRuleSorting
    A sorting, which applies to association rules.
    Sorting.ItemSetSorting
    A sorting, which applies to item sets.
    TieBreaker<T>
    A tie-breaking strategy, which allows to decide, which one of two item sets or association rules should be sorted before the other one, if their heuristic values are equal.
    TieBreaker.AssociationRuleTieBreaker
    A tie-breaking strategy, which applies to association rules.
    TieBreaker.ItemSetTieBreaker
    A tie-breaking strategy, which applies to item sets.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Sorting.Order
    Contains all possible orders, which can be used for sorting.
